Package cosc202.andie

package cosc202.andie
  • Class
    Description
    Andie
    Main class for A Non-Destructive Image Editor (ANDIE).
    BlockAveragingFilter
    Implements a block averaging filter that averages out the colors within a rectangular or square block of pixels to reduce noise and detail, including alpha channel handling.
    BrightnessAndContrast
    ImageOperation used to adjust an image's Brightness and Contrast.
    ClipToShape
    Provides functionality for cropping images to a specified shape.
    ColourActions
    Actions provided by the Colour menu.
    ColourChannelCycling
    This class implements the ImageOperation interface and can be used to apply color channel cycling to a BufferedImage.
    ConvertToGrey
    ImageOperation to convert an image from colour to greyscale.
    Convo2
    Convo2 applies convolution filters to images using a specified kernel.
    DrawShapes
    Provides functionality for drawing shapes (rectangles, ellipses, lines) on a BufferedImage.
    EditActions
    Actions provided by the Edit menu.
    EmbossFilter
    ImageOperation to apply an Emboss filter.
    FileActions
    Actions provided by the File menu.
    FilterActions
    Actions provided by the Filter menu.
    GaussianBlurFilter
    This class implements the ImageOperation interface and can be used to apply a gaussian filter to a BufferedImage.
    ImageAction
    Abstract class representing actions the user might take in the interface.
    ImageCrop
    Provides functionality for cropping images to a specified region.
    ImageFlip
    Provides functionality for flipping images either horizontally or vertically.
    ImageInversion
    Implements an operation to invert the colors of an image.
    ImageOperation
    Interface for operations to be applied to images.
    ImagePanel
    UI display element for EditableImages.
    ImageRotate
    Provides functionality to rotate an image by 0, 90, 180, or 270 degrees.
    LaplacianFilter
    ImageOperation to apply Laplacian filter.
    MacroActions
    Abstract class for handling macro actions.
    MeanFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Mean (simple blur) filter.
    MedianFilter
    ImageOperation to apply a Median filter.
    MouseSelection
    Manages the selection of a region on an ImagePanel using mouse events.
    RandomScatteringFilter
    Implements a random scattering effect that replaces each pixel in the output image with a random pixel from within a certain radius of the original location.
    ResizeImage
    Implements an operation to resize an image by a specified percentage increase.
    SaturationFilter
    This class implements the ImageOperation interface and can be used to apply a saturation filter to a BufferedImage.
    Settings
    Manages the application settings, including loading and storing configurations, and handling language specific properties.
    SharpenFilter
    This class implements the ImageOperation interface and can be used to apply a sharpening filter to a BufferedImage.
    SobelFilter
    ImageOperation to apply Sobel filter.
    Toolbar
    A toolbar to quickly access common actions so the user can efficiently perform operations.
    TransformImageAction
    Actions provided by the Transform menu.
    TransparencyImage
    Provides functionality for adjusting the transparency of an image.
    ViewActions
    Actions provided by the View menu.
